name: Dismantle On Sight (V)
Lore: 'After losing control of several extremely powerful and deadly assassin droids, the Empire issued a decree ordering their immediate destruction.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. After starting hands are drawn, players may only take into hand or deploy on table from Reserve Deck (except as a ''react'' or response) during their deploy phase (if another phase specified, it becomes ''during your deploy phase''). (Immune to Alter.)',
